text: The ZooParc de Beauval (or Beauval zoo) is a zoo in Saint-Aignan, Loir-et- Cher. It has nearly 35,000 animals, including two giant pandas, found nowhere else in France. It was created in 1980 by Fran√ßoise Delord. It is considered to be one of the largest zoos in Europe. ==References== Category:1980 establishments in France Category:Zoos Category:Loir-et-Cher Category:Buildings and structures in France Category:Organizations based in France
title: ZooParc de Beauval
